item.title: Video Editor for Bulk Video Editing - Upwork
item.description:
We are in need of a video editor who can efficiently handle bulk video editing tasks at a reasonable price. As a fresher or someone with moderate experience in video editing, you will be responsible for editing a large number of videos according to our specifications and requirements. The videos will vary in length and content, so you must be able to adapt and work with different file formats and codecs. Attention to detail and the ability to meet deadlines are crucial for this role. Relevant skills for this job include:

- Video editing software proficiency
- Knowledge of video formats and codecs
- Attention to detail
- Time management skills

If you have the necessary skills and are looking for an opportunity to gain experience in bulk video editing, we would love to hear from you.

Budget: $30
Posted On: June 16, 2024 14:09 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Commercial, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Commercial, Adobe After Effects
Country: India
click to apply

item.title: Looking for Engaging Spokesperson/ UGC to Present YouTube Videos! - Upwork
item.description:
Hello,

I am seeking someone who can read off scripts and present themselves in person.

This person will be in charge of being the spokesperson for various topics related to softwares, applications, services, and programs.

The person would need to have the following:
- Good on camera prescence
- English accent
- Good camera
- Teleprompter
- Good lighting

This person will be filming themselves reading off a script.

Compensation will be $12 per script read. Scripts will range from 8-20 minutes long.

These videos will be posted onto YouTube and we will be using stillshots of you to create thumbnails as well.

Budget: $400
Posted On: June 16, 2024 14:02 UTC
Category: Voice Talent
Skills:Voice-Over Recording, Male, Female, Spokesperson Video, Content Creation
Skills: Voice-Over Recording, Male, Female, Spokesperson Video, Content Creation
Country: United States

item.title: Seeking Expert Instructor to Develop 'Mastering FL Studio' A Comprehensive Online Course - Upwork
item.description:
Hello Music Producers and FL Studio Experts!

My name is Bar, and I am looking for a highly skilled and passionate instructor to develop a detailed online course focused on FL Studio. The course, entitled "Mastering FL Studio: From Novice to Expert," aims to guide students through a comprehensive 10-hour journey into the world of music production using this popular digital audio workstation.

Here’s what I envision for this course:

The course should comprehensively cover FL Studio from the basics to advanced techniques, including sessions on workflow, sound design, mixing, and mastering. Each lesson should start with a face shot introduction explaining the topics and techniques to be covered, followed by screen recording for step-by-step demonstrations within FL Studio. Excellent audio quality is crucial, so a top-notch microphone and screen recording setup are necessary.

Requirements:

Extensive experience and expertise in using FL Studio for music production.
Ability to explain and demonstrate complex production techniques clearly.
Experience in teaching music production or creating educational content.
High-quality video recording and audio capture equipment.
Interested instructors, please provide:

Your professional background in music production, specifically with FL Studio.
A detailed outline of the proposed course content, ensuring a logical progression from beginner to advanced levels.
A sample video or links to your previous instructional content or music projects.
This is an excellent opportunity to share your expertise and passion for music production, helping aspiring producers master FL Studio and enhance their creative abilities.

Best regards,
Bar

Guidelines for Crafting a Course with Me 😊

Organize the course into lessons lasting 5-20 minutes each, aiming for a total duration of around 10 hours.
Provide engaging and descriptive titles for each lesson.
Start each lesson with a face shot introduction to the topics and techniques to be covered.
Upload raw footage via Google Drive (please avoid Dropbox or Upwork).
Include specific editing instructions for our video editor to enhance the educational quality of the videos.
The first lesson should introduce the course, FL Studio, and any necessary equipment or software.
Conclude the course with a comprehensive review of all topics covered and encourage students to continue exploring and creating with FL Studio.
Ensure accuracy and thoroughness in content by comparing it with similar courses.
Include a 1-minute introductory video for each major section of the course, with scripts provided by me.
Ensure all videos are delivered in 1920x1080 MP4, H264 format.
I am excited to see your proposals and to collaborate on creating an impactful FL Studio course!

Budget: $1,400
Posted On: June 16, 2024 13:48 UTC
Category: Audio Editing
Skills:Sound Mixing, Audio Restoration, Music Placement, Vocal Tuning, Education, Content Writing, Online Instruction, Audio Editing, Video Editing, English
Skills: Sound Mixing, Audio Restoration, Music Placement, Vocal Tuning, Education, Content Writing, Online Instruction, Audio Editing, Video Editing, English
Country: Israel
click to apply

item.title: Video editor needed to re-create 80's TV intro - Upwork
item.description:
We are hoping to re-create the broadcast intro sequence for the Chicago Cubs on WGN-TV used in 1984.

We want the exact same animation with a few modifications:
- Whenever it says WGN-TV, we would want HTD-TV (the 9 does not have to stay)
- Instead of 1984 Chicago Cubs Baseball, we would want "2024 Hometown Cup Finals"
-Instead of the Cubs logo we would want the attached Cup logo
- We have a video that we can provide to replace the highlights/ads section

We would need no sound on this file, it would just be to recreate the animation and video portion. I'm not sure if it's possible to just edit the source file or if the animation would need to be re-done. We are not opposed to a "vintage" VHS quality to the final product.



Posted On: June 16, 2024 13:37 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Motion Graphics, Video Editing
Skills: Motion Graphics, Video Editing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video editing for daily Tiktok videos - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented video editor to assist in creating short, engaging TikTok videos on a daily basis. This freelance position involves creating original content based on specific themes.

Responsibilities:

Create 9 videos per day:
3 "useless facts"
2 riddles
3 "who was born today"
Add a simple background to the edited segments.
Ensure the edited videos meet the required duration and adhere to TikTok's content guidelines.


Video Schedule:

Videos will be required daily, 7 days a week, 30 days a month, 365 days a year.

Video Length:

For the first two months, videos will be around 20 seconds long.
After two months, once you are accustomed to the work, videos will be more than 1 minute long.

Task Details:

1, Useless Facts Videos:
Generate 3 "useless facts" per day using ChatGPT.
Follow example accounts for inspiration: @uselessfacts_official.
Use an AI video generator to create videos based on these facts.
Add a simple background to each video.
Use CapCut to hide any watermarks from the AI video generator.

2, Riddle Videos:
Generate 2 riddles per day using ChatGPT.
Follow example accounts for inspiration: @quizwhizcharlie, @info_nity360, @amazingquestions.
Use an AI video generator to create videos based on these riddles.
Add a simple background to each video.
Use CapCut to hide any watermarks from the AI video generator.

3, Who Was Born Today Videos:
Search in ChatGPT to identify celebrities or well-known people born on the current day.
Use AI to convert the text from ChatGPT to audio.
Add movement and photos of the specific celebrities in the background.
For the first two months, each video will feature only one celebrity or well-known person, with a length of around 20 seconds.
After two months, each video will feature 2-3 celebrities, resulting in videos over a minute long.
Example account for reference (focused on "Who Died Today"): @rustycageshow. Note: Our content will focus on "Who Was Born Today" rather than "Who Died Today," but the video style should be similar.


Salary:
$70 USD per month and the job is long term


Application Requirements:

In order to be considered for this position, you must submit your experience and one video for each of the tasks (3 videos in total) with your application.
Proposals without these videos will be automatically rejected.
Please do not just send your interest.

IMPORTANT NOTE
👇 👇 👇 👇 👇 👇 👇 👇 👇 👇 👇 👇 👇

***APPLICATIONS WITH OUT A VIDEO WILL BE AUTOMATICALLY REJECTED
*** SALARY IS $70 PER MONTH NO NEGOTIATION
***NUMBER OF VIDEOS IS 9 VIDEOS PER DAY, 7 DAYS A WEEK, 30 DAYS A MONTH AND 365 DAYS A YEAR
***PLEASE SEE ATTACHED EXAMPLE TIKTOK ACCOUNTS






Budget: $70
Posted On: June 16, 2024 13:36 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:TikTok Video, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Video Commercial
Skills: TikTok Video, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Video Commercial
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: True Crime Video Editor - ONLY Long term weekly projects. - Upwork
item.description:
We are actively hiring for an experienced Video editor to work with us on 12 months project.
We run a YouTube Channel and we need a passionate person experienced in creating YouTube videos.
(Please note these are  NOT AI GENERATED videos,  they are real world video compilations)

About the Project.
2-3 videos of 20 - 25 minutes per week for the rest of 2024.

Single Video Offer
$20 -$25 - this will gradually increase working together.

What's your role?
Straight forward, we will provide a video title script and voice over and you will find content from anywhere on the internet and put together an "original and engaging composition"  from your skillset.

About You!
- Quick turnaround.
- An editor taking DETAILS into account. (So important)
- Willing to work on a long term project because we want to maintain the same style of content.
- Familiar with YouTube Automation.
- Smart YouTube Video editor to beat copyrights.
- One that takes details serious.
- You have worked in a team on different time zones :)
- Ready to do a video sample of a given title.

NOTE: Please carefully, read the information above before you apply.

If you have the skills, experience  and passion most importantly required for this role, your welcome to our team.


Budget: $25
Posted On: June 16, 2024 13:15 UTC
Category: Visual Effects
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects
Country: United Arab Emirates
click to apply
